snippet: As E.V.’s become more common, there is continued debate over setting standards for the vehicles. One of the issues, yet to be resolved, is the look of road signs that tell drivers where they can recharge.
abstract: Debate continues over setting standards for electric vehicles, as they become more common; one issue yet to be resolved is the look of road signs that tell drivers where they can charge their vehicles.
lead_paragraph: As E.V.’s become more common, there is continued debate over setting standards for the vehicles. One of the issues, yet to be resolved, is the look of road signs that tell drivers where they can recharge.

headline.seo: Pointing the Way to Where E.V. Drivers Can Plug In
headline.main: Pointing the Way to Where E.V. Drivers Can Plug In
headline.print_headline: Pointing the Way to Where E.V. Drivers Can Plug In
